result.execSummary:
The defendant Roger A Cypher was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Costs to be paid as a Condition of Probation.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Submit to a psychological or psychiatric evaluation.

Defendant to register as sex offender.
Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent.
Any use of the internet is with the consent of the department.
DNA sample to be provided if not already done.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Roger A Cypher in court with attorney Ronald J. Sonderhouse.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties proceed to sentencing on Ct. 1. Lawrence R. and Bruce C. made statements. 

Court orders the following:
Ct. 1: 
- Total sentence: 4 years (Initial Confinement: 2 years, Extended Supervision: 2 years)  Stayed for 4 years Probation
- Court Costs of $268.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation; alternate 6 days jail consecutive
- DNA Surcharge of $250.00 to be paid as a Condition of Probation; alternate 5 days jail consecutive
- Conditions of  Probation: Defendant to register as a sex offender. Defendant to submit to a psychological or psychiatrict evaluation.  Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent. Any use of the internet is with the consent of the department.  DNA Sample if not yet provided.
 - 90 days jail Condition Time (nonworking hours) commencing 08/29/2014 by 7:00 p.m..  Non-working hours with standard release conditions.
From Atty Sonderhouse with several character letters filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Roger A Cypher
Current: 1218 N Water Street, Watertown, WI 53098 United States  (Effective: 08-19-2014)
Prior: 2881 Nassau Dr, Brookfield, WI
Sentencing hearing on August 28, 2014 at 02:15 pm.
Sentencing hearing on August 25, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Roger A Cypher in court with attorney Ronald J. Sonderhouse.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty. PSI requested. Court orders a PSI to be compiled and filed within 30 days. Defendant to cooperate fully with the pre-sentence investigation.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 25, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Hearing on July 14, 2014 at 11:00 am.

No unsupervised use of internet excepting at work. Not possess electronic devices associated with the internet.  Needs ID Processing. Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness, SMT or her residence or family members of the victim, no unsupervised contact with any under age females.

Defendant Roger A Cypher in court with attorney Ronald J Sonderhouse.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. Sonderhouse requests a plea date. Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness, SMT or her residence or family members of the victim, no unsupervised contact with any under age females. Hearing scheduled for July 14, 2014 at 11:00 am.
